0508.HK.summary: Dingyi Group Investment Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the loan financing and financial leasing businesses in the Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company is also involved in the sale of food and beverages; securities trading; and properties development businesses. In addition, it engages in the trading of wine; investment advisory; and restaurant operation businesses. The company was formerly known as Chevalier Pacific Holdings Limited and changed its name to Dingyi Group Investment Limited in February 2012. The company is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

0628.HK.summary: Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Hong Kong and People's Republic of China. The company offers commercial factoring, financial leasing, personal property pawn loans, real estate mortgage loans, and money lending services. It also provides consultancy and technical advisory services. The company was formerly known as Sino Credit Holdings Limited and changed its name to Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2017. The company is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Swiree Capital Limited.

0668.HK.summary: Doyen International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of loan financing services in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Investment Property Holding, Dongkui Business, and Sales of Flowers and Plants segments. It is also involved in the investment and rental of properties. The company owns Dong Dong Mall, a shopping arcade with a total gross floor area of 18,043.45 square meters located in Chongqing. In addition, it provides management services; and sells flowers, seedlings, and plants. The company was formerly known as Dowell Property Holdings Limited and changed its name to in Doyen International Holdings Limited in June 2016. Doyen International Holdings Limited is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Doyen International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Money Success Limited.

0730.HK.summary: Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited, an investment holding company, provides finance leasing and other financial services in Mainland China and Hong Kong. It operates through three divisions: Finance Leasing and Other Financial Services, Property Leasing and Building Management Services, and Assets Management. The company offers finance leasing for various sectors, including energy, transport, printing equipment, medical equipment, scientific and technical equipment, industrial equipment, etc. It is also involved in the investment, leasing, sale, and management of properties, such as industrial, office, and residential buildings; provision of property consultant, administrative and management, and referral and corporate financial advisory services; and investment and management of industrial funds. Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited has a strategic cooperation agreement with Jingdong Digits Technology Holding Co., Ltd. for cooperation in the field of supply chain business. The company is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited is a subsidiary of Wheeling Holdings Limited.

0764.HK.summary: Eternity Investment Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the sale of financial assets and money lending businesses. The company operates in four segments: Property Investment, Sale of Financial Assets, Money Lending, and Sale of Jewelry Products. It also designs and sells jewelry products; sells precious stones; and leases rental properties. In addition, the company manages membership-based golf club and resort that provides recreational and wellness services; provides property development and property management services; and manages and operates cultural forum and related cultural activities. It operates in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, Australia, Europe, and the United States. The company was formerly known as China Star Investment Holdings Limited and changed its name to Eternity Investment Limited in June 2010. Eternity Investment Limited is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

0900.HK.summary: AEON Credit Service (Asia) Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the consumer finance business primarily in Hong Kong. The company operates through three segments: Credit Card, Personal Loans, and Insurance. The Credit Card segment offers credit card services to individuals; and acquiring services for member stores. The Personal Loans segment provides personal loan financing services to individuals. The Insurance segment offers insurance agency and brokerage services. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong. AEON Credit Service (Asia) Company Limited is a subsidiary of AEON Financial Service (Hong Kong) Co., Limited.

2003.HK.summary: VCREDIT Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides online consumer finance services to prime and near-prime borrowers in China. The company offers credit card balance transfer and consumption credit products. It also provides loan facilitation, guarantee, micro credit, and financial leasing services, as well as technology services. The company was formerly known as Vision Capital Group Limited. VCREDIT Holdings Limited was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

8019.HK.summary: Hao Wen Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in money lending business in the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company also engages in the processing and trading of electronic parts; and manufacture and trading of biomass fuel products. Hao Wen Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong.

8071.HK.summary: China Netcom Technology Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial technology services in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Financial Technology Services Business, Apartment leasing Business, Lottery Business, and Sports Training Business segments. The Financial Technology Services Business segment offers credit referral and services, such as credit facilitation, post-origination, and financial guarantee services. The Apartment leasing Business segment manages and leases apartments for property owners and lessees. The Lottery Business segment develops computer software, hardware, and application system, as well as provides self-developed technology and related technical consultancy services to the operating system sector of lottery market. The Sports Training Business segment provides sports training services. The company also offers asset management services; and consultation and result transfer on network technology and computer network engineering services. The company was formerly known as China Metal Resources Holdings Limited and changed its name to China Netcom Technology Holdings Limited in January 2011. China Netcom Technology Holdings Limited is headquartered in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.

CGG.F.summary: Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited, an investment holding company, provides finance leasing and other financial services in Mainland China and Hong Kong. It operates through three divisions: Finance Leasing and Other Financial Services, Property Leasing and Building Management Services, and Assets Management. The company offers finance leasing for various sectors, including energy, transport, printing equipment, medical equipment, scientific and technical equipment, industrial equipment, etc. It is also involved in the investment, leasing, sale, and management of properties, such as industrial, office, and residential buildings; provision of property consultant, administrative and management, and referral and corporate financial advisory services; and investment and management of industrial funds. Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited has a strategic cooperation agreement with Jingdong Digits Technology Holding Co., Ltd. for cooperation in the field of supply chain business. The company is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited is a subsidiary of Wheeling Holdings Limited.

E9L.SI.summary: Joyas International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in financing business in the People's Republic of China. The company was incorporated in 1899 and is based in Kwai Chung, Hong Kong.

PHUP.SG.summary: Sino Prosper (Group) Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, invests in energy and natural resources related projects in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Investment in Energy and Natural Resources Related Projects, Money Lending, and Food and Beverage segments. The company holds interests in the Aohan Qi gold mine located in Inner Mongolia; and the Heilongjiang project. It also provides loan financing, and investment and management consultation services. In addition, the company imports, distributes, and sells food and beverage products. Further, it is involved in the provision of administrative, investment, management, mining consultation, and micro-financing services; and exploration and mining of gold. The company was formerly known as Sino Prosper State Gold Resources Holdings Limited and changed its name to Sino Prosper (Group) Holdings Limited in January 2014. Sino Prosper (Group) Holdings Limited is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

SG51.F.summary: SGOCO Group, Ltd. designs, develops, and manufactures phase change material storage systems for applications on cooling and heating systems in Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company's products include phase change material thermal energy storage products; LCD/LED monitors; and TV product-related and application-specific products. It is also involved in money lending services; and property lease and management activities. In addition, the company provides fintech and IT support services. It sells its products under the SGOCO, No. 10, and POVIZON brand names. The company was formerly known as SGOCO Technology, Ltd. SGOCO Group, Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.

SGOC.summary: SGOCO Group, Ltd. designs, develops, and manufactures phase change material storage systems for applications on cooling and heating systems in Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company's products include phase change material thermal energy storage products; LCD/LED monitors; and TV product-related and application-specific products. It is also involved in money lending services; and property lease and management activities. In addition, the company provides fintech and IT support services. It sells its products under the SGOCO, No. 10, and POVIZON brand names. The company was formerly known as SGOCO Technology, Ltd. SGOCO Group, Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.

TFN4.F.summary: Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Hong Kong and People's Republic of China. The company offers commercial factoring, financial leasing, personal property pawn loans, real estate mortgage loans, and money lending services. It also provides consultancy and technical advisory services. The company was formerly known as Sino Credit Holdings Limited and changed its name to Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2017. The company is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Swiree Capital Limited.
